COVID-19

How to stay safe

Wearing a mask

If you wear a mask you're less likely to pass COVID-19 onto other people.

Washing your hands

Washing your hands for 20 seconds will stop you spreading the virus by touch.

Social distancing

Standing 2 metres apart will reduce air bourne transmission of the virus.

How to get tested

Getting tested if you're a key worker

If you're a key worker, you can book a test within 24 hours using the Book a COVID test for Keyworkers service.

Getting a test for somebody in a care home

If you work in a care home you can have tests delivered using the Request a batch test kit for care homes service.
